    • Method Detail

      • bind

        public void bind(LogBinder.Listener listener)
        Bind the log to the specified listener. Will be invoked only once for each implementation. The implementation of this class should call LogBinder.Listener.logInvoked(LogInvocation) for each log invocation.
        Specified by:
        bind in interface LogBinder
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to bind the log invocations to

      • isBound

        public boolean isBound()
        Returns true after bind has been called, otherwise false
        Specified by:
        isBound in interface LogBinder
        Returns:
        true after bind has been called, otherwise false
